Title: Empty talk harms the nation, to do solid work makes the nation flourish
Publisher: CCP Central Propaganda Department - Zhonggong zhongyang xuanchuanbu (中共中央宣传部)
Notes: The text reads "Our generation of Communists must inherit the past and usher in the future, build on the past, build our party well, unite all Chinese sons and daughters to build our nation well, and continue to forge ahead towards the goal of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation".
Theme: Party and State LeadersXi JinpingDeng XiaopingJiang ZeminHu Jintao
